View all PCL conferences

Source: R/mlb_conferences.R
mlb_conferences.Rd

View all PCL conferences

Usage

mlb_conferences(conference_id = NULL, season = NULL)

Arguments

conference_id

Conference ID to return information for.

season

Year to return to return conference information for.

Value

Returns a tibble with the following columns

col_nametypes
conference_idinteger
conference_namecharacter
linkcharacter
conference_abbreviationcharacter
has_wildcardlogical
name_shortcharacter
league_idinteger
league_linkcharacter
sport_idinteger
sport_linkcharacter

Examples

# \donttest{
  try(mlb_conferences())
#> ── MLB Conferences data from MLB.com ──────────────── baseballr 1.5.0 ──
#> ℹ Data updated: 2023-03-19 21:40:12 UTC
#> # A tibble: 2 × 10
#>   confer…¹ confe…² link  confe…³ has_w…⁴ confe…⁵ leagu…⁶ leagu…⁷ sport…⁸
#>      <int> <chr>   <chr> <chr>   <lgl>   <chr>     <int> <chr>     <int>
#> 1      301 PCL Am… /api… PCLA    FALSE   PCL Am…     112 /api/v…      11
#> 2      302 PCL Pa… /api… PCLP    FALSE   PCL Pa…     112 /api/v…      11
#> # … with 1 more variable: sport_link <chr>, and abbreviated variable
#> #   names ¹​conference_id, ²​conference_name, ³​conference_abbreviation,
#> #   ⁴​has_wildcard, ⁵​conference_name_short, ⁶​league_id, ⁷​league_link,
#> #   ⁸​sport_id
  try(mlb_conferences(conference_id =  301, season = 2020))
#> ── MLB Conferences data from MLB.com ──────────────── baseballr 1.5.0 ──
#> ℹ Data updated: 2023-03-19 21:40:13 UTC
#> # A tibble: 1 × 10
#>   confer…¹ confe…² link  confe…³ has_w…⁴ confe…⁵ leagu…⁶ leagu…⁷ sport…⁸
#>      <int> <chr>   <chr> <chr>   <lgl>   <chr>     <int> <chr>     <int>
#> 1      301 PCL Am… /api… PCLA    FALSE   PCL Am…     112 /api/v…      11
#> # … with 1 more variable: sport_link <chr>, and abbreviated variable
#> #   names ¹​conference_id, ²​conference_name, ³​conference_abbreviation,
#> #   ⁴​has_wildcard, ⁵​conference_name_short, ⁶​league_id, ⁷​league_link,
#> #   ⁸​sport_id
# }
